ProjectTitle: Effectiveness and mechanisms of menthol inhalation for the relief of dyspnea in health and COPD  (MENTHODYSC)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
15/03/2024
Preservation: Note that the UZL ethical committee may request to preserve data related to patients for 25 years, if you are not sure which data to keep for how long best to check with ctc@uzleuven.be
Sharing: Note that OSF is not suitable for sensitive data or data where there is still a (small) chance of identifying the patients, for this kind of data you can use a repository that allows you to apply access restrictions e.g. as RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
